item.title: Flare.io CTF-3: Layer-Walkers
item.description:
This is a write-up for Flare.io CTF, Week 3 of 6. This challenge takes place during a very demanding academic period, the finals… Although time was limited, I learned to work more efficiently in order to balance my responsibilities.

Overview

The challenge is titled ‘Layer-Walkers’, we are given a website

https://techno-plaza-2000.com/

along with the hint:

One layer opens another.

First glance

The website in question is formatted as a forum, it contains boards and posts. Here are the 5 boards:

item.title: Flare.io CTF-1: Knights of the Stolen Session
item.description:
Flare.io is hosting a CTF in which they release 1 challenge a week for the next 6 weeks. The theme is medieval which I love. I’m a big fan of games like elden ring and dark souls, in otherwords anything with knights, mages, dragons, etc. It’s a very pleasing aesthetic in my opinion. This write-up is about this week’s challenge, the first of six.

Overview

The challenge is titled ‘Knights of the Stolen Session’ and all that is given is a GitHub profile with one repository of a d20 simulator.
